title: Update Infinity Wallet theme to match uploaded Infinity Coin logo (futuristic/digital)

requirements.text: Update the Infinity Wallet visual theme to be futuristic and digitally appealing, using the uploaded Infinity Coin logo image (image.png) as the primary visual inspiration (color palette, glow/gradient style, typography, and overall UI feel), and apply it consistently across all existing screens (Dashboard, Send, Contacts, History) and the main layout.

quotes: i like this but my theme is going to be this picture logo of my coin. make it futuristic and digitally appealing.

acceptanceCriteria: Theme tokens in frontend/index.css are updated to reflect a futuristic/digital style inspired by image.png (e.g., dark/space-like surfaces, neon accents, high-contrast text), while keeping UI readable and accessible.
AppLayout header/navigation/footer and all page headers/cards/forms visually match the updated theme (consistent background, borders, radii, shadows/glows, and hover/focus states).
No changes are made to any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them via props/classes only).

requirements.text: Update the existing static branding assets so they visually match the uploaded Infinity Coin logo style (image.png), keeping filenames/paths compatible with the current UI usage.

quotes: my theme is going to be this picture logo of my coin

acceptanceCriteria: The app header logo (used by frontend/src/components/layout/WalletLogo.tsx) renders the updated infinity-wallet-logo.dim_1024x1024.png without layout breakage.
The Infinity Coin token icon (used on the Dashboard balance card) renders the updated infinity-coin-icon.dim_512x512.png and matches the futuristic/neon style.
All images are served as static frontend assets (no backend image serving).

constraints: Respect the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture; no backend changes are required for this request.
Do not edit immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (including frontend/src/components/ui and auth/actor hooks).
Keep existing image paths used in the UI working (e.g., /assets/generated/infinity-wallet-logo.dim_1024x1024.png and /assets/generated/infinity-coin-icon.dim_512x512.png).
nonGoals: Adding new wallet features (e.g., Receive flow, real on-chain transfers) beyond visual/theme updates.
Changing authentication behavior (Internet Identity) or backend data models.

edits: Restyle to match the uploaded Infinity Coin logo (image.png) with a futuristic neon/digital aesthetic (infinity-wallet-logo.dim_1024x1024.png > infinity-wallet-logo.dim_1024x1024.png)
Restyle to match the uploaded Infinity Coin logo (image.png) with a futuristic neon/digital aesthetic (infinity-coin-icon.dim_512x512.png > infinity-coin-icon.dim_512x512.png)

preferencesToAdd: Futuristic, digitally appealing UI theme based on the provided Infinity Coin logo image
